title: Panel, 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
description: Oblong panel of red velvet embroidered in blue, orange and metallic threads. Central motif has an Arabic inscription and is surrounded by a radiating floral pattern. Border in a stylized vine and flower pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 18th–early 19th century.
18th–early 19th century. Medium: silk, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1952-166-51.
